fields.name: Effect:
fields.value:
Place 2 barriers on the playerlist.

*There may only be a max of 2 barriers on the playerlist at once. Cards and abilities cannot pass through barriers. A regular barrier can be destroyed using anything that deals damage. Barriers will not carry from Day into Night, but will carry over to the next Day phase. Barrier! used during the Night phase will only take effect for that Night phase.*
